website_summaries.verdict: The Daydream View is the simplest, most affordable way to turn a phone into an immersive VR headset.
pros: Affordable, portable and easy to set up
The bundled motion controller is convenient and easy to use
Exclusive YouTube, Google Street View and Google Photos feel like potential killer apps
cons: It only works with Google Pixel and Moto Z for now (more on the way)
The headset is front-heavy and frequently needs adjusting
There's limited app selection at launch and you can't walk around or grab things in VR

customer_reviews.title: ... continued use before performance suffers and phone needs to cool down I've used the plastic Google cardboard headset which ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent vr experience I personally feel the cloth setup traps the heat in and only allows around 20 min of continued use before performance suffers and phone needs to cool down I've used the plastic Google cardboard headset which seemed to deal with the heat slightly better in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Krispiracy

customer_reviews.title: Really fun for a few days
customer_reviews.text: Really fun for a few days. Took it down a star because of the amount of dust it traps that you can't easily clean out, and because it lets in too much light.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Good VR experience, lackluster.
customer_reviews.text: Good tech and responsiveness, hopefully they develop it more, compared to the Samsung VR this is definitely missing a lot of content and is not as nice.
customer_reviews.author: Baka

customer_reviews.title: Awesome VR!
customer_reviews.text: The unit is sleek and clean looking. Really enjoyable for a cool 3D experience!
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Looking forward to more apps as the technology advances.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have had no problems and it works perfectly. Very comfortable as well, and it has a nice light-weight feel to it!
customer_reviews.author: Benjy D.

customer_reviews.title: Love the daydream apps
customer_reviews.text: Love the daydream apps...didn't like the head set that comes with the daydream system (gave them to the Grand children) .....I have a better headset so I used mine with the daydream system ...love it....
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Rogers -Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Good VR Headset
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my pixel. Works as expected for a phone VR system. The image is a little blurry but can't expect much less for phone VR. Otherwise Google has implemented some nice features that work well with their product.
customer_reviews.author: bigc5012

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just dont use it as much as I thought
customer_reviews.author: Tempest Trooper

customer_reviews.title: Truly spectacular!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this VR headset enough! (If you have a Google pixel or pixel XL) The price is fantastic! It's super comfortable! Honestly probably the most comfortable on the market. The Field of View could be a little better but honestly it's still really awesome! Everything looks and feels just super sharp! The tutorial "welcome" is very good and there are plenty of things to do that are even free! P.S. your phone will get warm (which is normal). Also, expect your battery to go pretty fast! Lucky the Pixel has great battery life and efficiency!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Heuler

customer_reviews.title: Cool but heavy on face.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but sits very heavy on face. But its cool
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: I like this VR headset
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice VR headset. I was very excited to get this for my new pixel. It's cheap and easy to use. I have a good experience with it. The only problem is that it is a little heavy and it's easy to get tired if wear it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: its very difficult to find compatibles phones to use the ...
customer_reviews.text: its very difficult to find compatibles phones to use the daydream. I have an iPhone and none of the VR content I downloaded is suitable for the daydream
customer_reviews.author: Rasha Muallem

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool headset
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it. Hurts to have it on after 20 min or so. But for a phone VR headset, I was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Scarp331

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool experience! Good Quality display- phone gets hot quick though - but thats a phone problem
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Wait for upgrades. This is an expensive cheap toy right now.
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable, but the view isn't that great on a phone. Too many pixels to really loose yourself in it. Field of view isn't as good as the fancy one my brother has. I didn't expect it to be that fancy but I don't end up using it much because of the lack of interesting apps and the not-that great visuals.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not particularly comfortable, difficult to wear with glasses, not light tight, and has to be positioned perfectly in order to not be blurry. Gear VR is a much better experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: My Moto z Droid gets very hot after very little time of using, other than that works pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs some improvements
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised Goggle did not engineer any adjustment for the phone and eye piece. You can put a pixel xl in the headset but it really does not align vertically in the center with a slim case on the phone. This was not a problem so much with their app but it maybe with other apps. The litchi app did not work well because it was way off center. I'm going to wait and see if goggle comes out with a upgraded headset I hope.
customer_reviews.author: John Sr

customer_reviews.title: Good for Pixel Phones
customer_reviews.text: This works better for the Pixel phone, Moto Z, Mate 9 pro, Axon 7, and unfortunately doesn't work well with iPhones.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Headache generator
customer_reviews.text: Grainy, distorted image. Gave me a splitting headache after a few minutes use.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Warwick

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Wast Of Money!
customer_reviews.text: I got this at 60% off and only paid $50. It's not worth a dime. A complete waste of money! It's absolutely constantly necessary to center the image view over and over and over again. The available software is not good and the images are very grainy. Obviously the technology just isn't there yet. Save or spend your money on something else. The only positive thing I'll say is it's well made and of good quality. It will look great sitting on a shelf somewhere. I've had mine about three months and it's in the box. And there it will stay......
customer_reviews.author: Jayson D Nall

customer_reviews.title: too hot. not ready for primetime.
customer_reviews.text: it was cool until my Pixel phone got hot. Not much fun after that. Plus it's uncomfortable and cumbersome, it's either too tight, or it slips down my face when I dare to look down. Everyone in my family used it...for a bit,..now it gathers dust.
customer_reviews.author: Nath

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea, Bad Execution
customer_reviews.text: I bought the slate version. The fit is soft but awkward. There are very noticeable caps on the sides and bottom of the headset when you're wearing it. In addition, the controller is confusing, doesn't come charged, and takes quite a while to charge. Overall, I would recommend a different headset. I'm using it on a Google Pixel (which is a great phone) and it doesn't let you use cardboard headset apps with the Daydream. This is extremely frustrating. In addition, the free games on the Daydream app are limited. To get the full experience you have to buy addition games and such.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I really like it for the ten minutes that the phone will ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pixel XL (and all things Google) so it made sense to pick one of these up. I really like it for the ten minutes that the phone will work with it before it overheats. I called Google, they offered to replace the phone but I'd have to ship it to them, then they would ship me a refurbished phone. I do work on my phone so could not do this... So basically, I have a tpy that lasts for ten minutes. Maybe I'll pick up a Samsung outfit...VR is picking up steam!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bret Tungate

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: I just cannot find a comfortable position with this thing. It gives me a headache. It could really use an over the head strap to keep it up. I feel like it's either sliding off my head or so tight my forehead hurts (and yes, I have the strap in the suggested position). Also, the straps loosen themselves. So after a while (particularly when taking it off and on again) I have to adjust the straps. I'm just amazed that Google produced such an awkward headset.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Johnson

product_meta.title: Google Daydream View Headset & Controller for Pixel, XL, Mate 9 Pro, Axon 7, Moto Z - Snow
product_meta.description: Daydream view is a headset and controller for experiencing high-quality, immersive virtual reality (VR). simply place your daydream-ready phone into the headset to get started.
feature_bullets: Don't just see the world, experience it. With daydream view, you can teleport from virtually anywhere to Pretty much everywhere.
Browse from an ever-growing Collection of apps and games in the daydream app - a home for all of your virtual reality experiences.
You can always get the best seat in the house with daydream view. Experience concerts, sports and more in full 360 degree panoramic view.
The daydream view controller transforms with your imagination. Go from the sidelines to the center of action. Feel the adrenaline Rush as you speed down the racetrack.
Daydream View’s lightweight, durable headset is made from soft, breathable fabric to help you stay comfortable longer.
Compatible phones: Google (Pixel 2,Pixel) Samsung (Galaxy S9 & S9+,Galaxy S8 & S8+,Galaxy Note8), Moto Z & Z2, LG V30, ASUS ZenFone AR, Huawei Mate 9 Pro, ZTE Axon 7

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars45 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Daydream View headsetDaydream View controllerWrist strapQuick start guide
